name: Floowandereeze and the Unexplored Winds
text: You can conduct Tribute Summons that require 2 Tributes by sending 1 monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls to the GY instead of Tributing (it is still treated as a Tribute Summon). During your Main Phase: You can reveal up to 2 Winged Beast monsters in your hand and place them on the bottom of your Deck in any order, then draw cards equal to the number of cards placed. You can only use this effect of "Floowandereeze and the Unexpd Winds" once per turn.
